benchmark_details.name: M3CoT (Multi-Domain Multi-step Multi-modal Chain-of-Thought)
benchmark_details.overview: M3CoT introduces a novel benchmark to advance multi-domain, multi-step, and multi-modal Chain-of-Thought reasoning, addressing challenges such as the absence of visual modal reasoning and the need for complex multi-step reasoning across diverse domains.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To serve as a valuable resource for evaluating multi-domain, multi-step, and multi-modal reasoning capabilities in large models.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of vision large language models on the M3CoT benchmark.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better reasoning performance of models across multi-step and multi-modal contexts.
